messages.message: Hey team, just wanted to shout out that the `ibdev-backend` crafting template has really improved backend development and testing for me and fellow doc-insighters! :pray: :tada: We're experiencing much more stability/less issue reports, quick/nearly instant testing with starting up a sandbox and restarting services, and the DB setup has also made it super easy to safely, and comprehensively test DB migrations. Thanks @mfichman ++ @sean.donohoe ++ and team a bunch for the work here! :,)
All credit should go to @mfichman, I just :white_check_mark: his PRs :joy: :heart_hands:

Thanks @pauline.comising!

@sean.donohoe, you gave me a ton of help/guidance throughout! The kudos are warranted!
